title: Riven, Exile the Enemy

embed.description: Click "Like" and "Subscribe!" if you like this video. Helps us! Video Info: a Montage i made of me having fun on Riven, Enjoy! Let me know below if you enjoyed the video or not and feel free to let me know whats worked and what did not.

body: I had alot of fun making it, If you have time i would appreciate some feedback

replies.body: over edit of and unskilled champ doing very unskilled things it alright.
1 shitty comment vs 2 actual feedback (s) Like? wat
well those hate comments, no actual feedback which is dissapointing

Use a champ with skill?

Seriously though the shitty screen shakes are just annoying.

And nearly all of the slow mo's were rehashes that were pointless (what happened was completely obvious)

Now do all this with Riven's nerfed ultimate and it might take some skill.
You should try comboing your ult with something else, e.g. R + W at the same time.
Title. only thing that bugs me, Wasnt riven the one to be exiled? if so then make a montage of you vs yasuo Kek
